title: If Google stops working for 1,000 days, what will happen? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends- you have to define what you mean by this since Google is a giant company. You’re also talking about almost 3 years. It’s possible people will stop researching things and then post lame questions on Quora just wasting peoples time. Sorry, I forgot they already do that now.
Nobody, neither any person or company is indespensible. If Google will not be available to users, they will use alternatives to it. Other companies will capture Google's market share.
